Text:
Greatly appreciated upload.

But can you PLZ name the season after the correct source. After Fox this is season 5.
And my XBMC cant find season 6 since it does not exist. Just annoying renaming every episode i download.

Anyway greatly appreciated upload !!!!!!
The file names are correct it is the tvdb scraper that is wrong.  See this link for the correct names of episodes and seasons: http://epguides.com/KitchenNightmares/
